tool_description: Use this API to determine the location where a Nigeria car is registered.
title: Car Verification Nigeria

api_list.name: Verify Plate Number Location
api_list.description: Enter the first 3-digit of any Nigeria plate number to know the state and LGA it comes from. For example, if a plate number is GGE123YZ. you will pass the parameter as GGE or gge (not case sensitive) and the state, LGA and state slogan will be displayed including its unique id. Feel free to try it out.

api_list.name: Add Plate Number Code Location
api_list.description: This is a post request to add your own local government plate number code that you think we have omitted in this API. Please ensure that all fields are entered correctly (3-digit only). Thanks
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-verification-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com/reportaplate.php"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-verification-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://car-verification-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com/reportaplate.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-verification-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
